attributes.action: Stop the project to reopen the Keswick Railway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This project is doomed to failure due to the trackbed now being blocked in numerous places. The cost of going around any blockages is massive.

The railway would spoil what is the best part of the Lake District.

Many peoples homes back onto this railway and the railway would cause noise and nuisance.

There is no need for a railway, the A66 runs well inside its capacity with cars, buses and taxis.

Lets put a stop to this madcap idea to reopen the railway.
